clumpy.definition.LandUseCoverLayer¶

class clumpy.definition.LandUseCoverLayer(name=None, time=0, path=None, data=None, copy_geo=None)[source]¶

Bases: clumpy.definition._layer._Layer

Defines a Land Use Cover (LUC) layer. This layer can then used for the calibration stage or the allocation stage.

Parameters

  • name (str, default=``None``) – The layer name.

  • time (float, default=``0``) – The layer time (year unit).

  • path (str) – The tiff file path. If data is provided, a new tiff file will be created according to this path and this operation overwrites the file path if exists.

  • data (numpy.ndarray, defaul=None) – The data to write. If None, no writing is made.

  • copy_geo (LandUseCoverLayer, default=None) – The layer from whose geo metadata are copied. If None, geo metadata are set to None.

Attributes

  • raster_ (rasterio.io.DatasetReader) – The unbuffered data and metadata reader object, provided by rasterio.

  • style_ (list of dict) – The style used for displaying.

Methods

clean_style([null])

Clean the style_ attr

display(center, window[, show, colorbar])

Display the land use cover layer through python console with matplotlib.

export_asc(path[, verbose])

Export the layer data as an asc file in order to use it through CLUES and CLUMondo.

import_style(path)

Import legend through qml file provided by QGis.

get_data
clean_style(null='#ffffff')[source]¶

Clean the style_ attr

Parameters

null (TYPE, optional) – DESCRIPTION. The default is ‘#ffffff’.

Returns

Return type

None.

display(center, window, show=True, colorbar=True)[source]¶

Display the land use cover layer through python console with matplotlib.

Parameters

  • values (list of int) – List of displayed states.

  • colors (list of str) – List of colors in HTML format.

  • names (list of names) – List of state names.

  • center (tuple of two integers) – Center position as a tuple.

  • window (tuple of two integers) – Window dimensions as a tuple.

export_asc(path, verbose=0)¶

Export the layer data as an asc file in order to use it through CLUES and CLUMondo.

Parameters

  • path (str) – path to the file.

  • verbose (int, default=0) – level of verbosity.

import_style(path)[source]¶

Import legend through qml file provided by QGis. Alpha is not supported.

Parameters

path (str) – The qml file path
